message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's in great condition and worth a lot more, but I'm willing to make a deal. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product and your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $100 for the product.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $110. This is a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's make this deal happen!
I understand your position, Alice. I'll make one last offer. How about $105 for the product?
